title: Mobility & Positioning — Spinal Precautions
description: Master safe handling, neutral spine, and equipment use. Practice team roles and checklist routines.

screens.title: Neutral Spine Principle
screens.body: Always maintain spinal alignment during transfers and turns.

screens.prompt: You are leading a log-roll for a patient with spinal precautions. What is your first step?

options.result: Correct — clear communication and role assignment are essential.
Unsafe — always prepare and communicate first.
Patients may not be able to assist safely.

screens.prompt: Assign each team member to their role in the transfer.
Think about a challenging transfer. What made it successful or risky?
